SELECT mp.`ID` AS ID,mc.CONTRACT_NO,mc.`RECORD_NO` AS RECORD_NO,mc.`MEMBER_NAME_A`,mc.`MEMBER_NAME_B`, mc.`TYPE`,mc.`SIGNED_DATE`,(SUM((CASE WHEN mi.`AMOUNT` IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE mi.`AMOUNT` END)) +SUM((CASE WHEN a.AMOUNT IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE a.AMOUNT END))) AS PAY_AMOUNT,mp.`PAY_REAL` AS PAY_REAL, (SUM((CASE WHEN mi.`AMOUNT` IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE mi.`AMOUNT` END)) +SUM((CASE WHEN a.AMOUNT IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE a.AMOUNT END))-SUM((CASE WHEN mp.`PAY_REAL` IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE mp.`PAY_REAL` END))) AS NO_PAY_AMOUNT FROM M_CONTRACT_PAY mp LEFT JOIN M_CONTRACT mc ON mp.CONTRACT_No=mc.CONTRACT_NO LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM M_CONTRACT_ITEM WHERE UPDATE_STATE<>1 OR UPDATE_STATE IS NULL) mi ON mi.`CONTRACT_ID`=mp.`CONTRACT_No` LEFT JOIN (SELECT mcm.`CONTRACT_ID` AS CONTRACT_NO ,mcmdi.`AMOUNT` AS AMOUNT, mcmdi.`UPDATE_STATE` AS UPDATE_STATE FROM M_CONTRACT_MODIFY mcm,M_CONTRACT_MODIFY_ITEM mcmdi WHERE mcm.`ID`=mcmdi.`MODIFY_ID` AND (mcmdi.`UPDATE_STATE` <>1 OR mcmdi.`UPDATE_STATE` IS NULL)) a ON a.CONTRACT_NO=mp.`CONTRACT_No` WHERE 1=1
AND mc.RECORD_NO LIKE CONCAT('%',#{condition.recordNo},'%')
AND mc.CONTRACT_NO LIKE CONCAT('%',#{condition.contractNo},'%')
AND mc.TYPE =#{condition.contractType}
AND mc.SIGNED_DATE >=CONCAT(#{condition.startDate}," 00:00:00" ) AND mc.SIGNED_DATE <= CONCAT(#{condition.endDate}," 23:59:59")
GROUP BY mp.`CONTRACT_No`
